title: [Caligos Carvings]
description: Pale blue carpets cover the abundant floor space in this spacious hollow carved into the granite cliffside.  Painted clay pots are set along the walls, brimming with hand-carved knick-knacks.  A small table, draped in blue cotton cloth, sits in the middle of the space, surrounded by stone pedestals holding various figurines, statues, and carvings.
